LanguageData.AteExtravagantMeal.stages.0.label: ate extravagant meal
LanguageData.AteExtravagantMeal.stages.0.description: I... I have no words.. is.. is this what the gods eat? Do they eat like this on glitterworlds?
LanguageData.AteCannedMeal.stages.0.label: ate canned meal
LanguageData.AteCannedMeal.stages.0.description: Eh. Canned meals aren't as good as freshly cooked ones, but it could be worse.
LanguageData.AteCannedMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.label: ate canned meat
LanguageData.AteCannedMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.descr: I don't want to know what kind of meat this is, but whatever it is, ick.
LanguageData.AteCannedFruitAsIngredient.stages.0.desc: You know what, this ain't too bad!
LanguageData.AteCannedVegetablesAsIngredient.stages.0: Eh, could be worse, but it has a tinny flavor.
LanguageData.AteFruitPreserves.stages.0.label: ate fruit preserves
LanguageData.AteFruitPreservesAsIngredient.stages.0.l: ate fruit preserves in a meal
LanguageData.AteIcecream.stages.0.label: ate icecream
LanguageData.AteChocolateIcecream.stages.0.label: ate chocolate icecream
